analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: NEUTRAL REGIME PERSISTS AMIDST MEGA-CAP EROSION. Current GMS at 47 signals a transitionary equilibrium where credit spread compression is insufficient to offset the erosion of equity premiums and commodity liquidation. The flat OGV vector, coupled with significant valuation decay in mega-cap tech, indicates a regime degradation characterized by decelerating momentum. As the fiscal-monetary nexus lacks a clear catalyst and liquidity convexity remains absent, market participants must exercise tactical restraint. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: NEUTRAL REGIME PERSISTS AMIDST MEGA-CAP EROSION. Current GMS at 47 signals a transitionary equilibrium where credit spread compression is insufficient to offset the erosion of equity premiums and commodity liquidation. The flat OGV vector, coupled with significant valuation decay in mega-cap tech, indicates a regime degradation characterized by decelerating momentum. As the fiscal-monetary nexus lacks a clear catalyst and liquidity convexity remains absent, market participants must exercise tactical restraint. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

El vector OGV plano y el deterioro de valoraciones en tecnolÃ³gicas de gran capitalizaciÃ³n indican una degradaciÃ³n del rÃ©gimen por desaceleraciÃ³n del momentum. Sin convexidad de liquidez, el nexo fiscal-monetario carece de impulso ascendente. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: REZIM NETRAL BERTAHAN DI TENGAH EROSI MEGA-CAP. GMS 47 menunjukkan ekuilibrium transisi di mana kompresi spread kredit tidak mampu mengimbangi likuidasi komoditas dan devaluasi ekuitas. Vektor OGV datar serta peluruhan valuasi teknologi berkapitalisasi besar mengindikasikan degradasi rezim yang ditandai oleh deselerasi momentum. Tanpa adanya konveksitas likuiditas dan sentimen kripto yang tertekan, neksus fiskal-moneter gagal memberikan katalis bagi apresiasi aset lebih lanjut. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

Der flache OGV-Vektor und der Bewertungsabbau bei Mega-Cap-Tech deuten auf eine Regimedegradierung durch Momentum-Verlust hin.
